        font.setWeight(75)
        self.label_22.setFont(font)
        self.label_22.setObjectName("label_22")

    def connect_buttons(self):
        self.dashboard1.clicked.connect(self.switch_to_dashboardpage)
        self.dashboard2.clicked.connect(self.switch_to_dashboardpage)
        self.create1.clicked.connect(self.switch_to_createpage)
        self.create2.clicked.connect(self.switch_to_createpage)
        self.update1.clicked.connect(self.switch_to_updatepage)
        self.update2.clicked.connect(self.switch_to_updatepage)
        self.delete1.clicked.connect(self.switch_to_deletepage)
        self.pushButton_8.clicked.connect(self.switch_to_deletepage)

    def switch_to_dashboardpage(self):  
        self.stackedWidget.setCurrentIndex(0)

    def switch_to_createpage(self):  
        self.stackedWidget.setCurrentIndex(1)

    def switch_to_updatepage(self):  
        self.stackedWidget.setCurrentIndex(2) 

    def switch_to_deletepage(self):  
        self.stackedWidget.setCurrentIndex(3)     

    def retranslateUi(self, MainWindow):
        _translate = QtCore.QCoreApplication.translate
        MainWindow.setWindowTitle(_translate("EMSI SMART", "EMSI SMART"))
        self.label_3.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "EMSI SMART"))

        self.create2.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Create"))

        item.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "ID"))
        item = self.tableWidget_2.horizontalHeaderItem(1)
        item.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "FirstName"))
        item = self.tableWidget_2.horizontalHeaderItem(2)
        item.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "LastName"))
        item = self.tableWidget_2.horizontalHeaderItem(3)
        item.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "New Column"))
        item = self.tableWidget_2.horizontalHeaderItem(4)
        item.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Phone Number"))
        self.label_25.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "ID"))
        self.pushButton_15.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "DELETE"))
        self.label_26.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "DELETE EMPLOYER :"))
        
        
        
        self.pushButton_13.clicked.connect(self.addNew)
        self.pushButton_14.clicked.connect(self.updat_employer)
        self.pushButton_15.clicked.connect(self.supprimer_employer)
        
    def addNew(self):
        nom=self.lineEdit.text()
        prenom=self.lineEdit_2.text()
        email=self.lineEdit_3.text()
        Phone=self.lineEdit_4.text()
        print(prenom,nom,email,Phone)
        employe = Employe(nom, prenom, email,Phone)
        if(employe.create()):
            msg = QMessageBox()
            msg.setWindowTitle("Emsi_Smart ")
            msg.setText("L'employé a été correctement enregistré :)")
            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
            x = msg.exec_()
        else:
            msg = QMessageBox()
            msg.setWindowTitle("Emsi_Smart ")
            msg.setText("L'enregistrement de l'employé a échoué :)")
            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Critical)
            x = msg.exec_()
    
    def updat_employer(self):
        id=self.lineEdit_10.text()
        nom=self.lineEdit_5.text()
        prenom=self.lineEdit_6.text()
        email=self.lineEdit_7.text()
        phone=self.lineEdit_8.text()
        employe=Employe(nom, prenom, email,phone)
        result=employe.update(id)
        print(result)
        if(result=='Done'):
            msg = QMessageBox()
            msg.setWindowTitle("Emsi_Smart ")
            msg.setText("L'employé a été correctement modifié :)")
            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
            x = msg.exec_()
        else:
            msg = QMessageBox()
            msg.setWindowTitle("Emsi_Smart ")
            msg.setText(f"La modification de l'employé a échoué : {result}")
            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Critical)
            x = msg.exec_()
            
    def supprimer_employer(self):
        id=self.lineEdit_9.text()
        employe=Employe()
        result=employe.update(id)
        if(result=='Done'):
            msg = QMessageBox()
            msg.setWindowTitle("Emsi_Smart ")
            msg.setText("L'employé a été correctement supprimé :)")
            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
            x = msg.exec_()
        else:
            msg = QMessageBox()
            msg.setWindowTitle("Emsi_Smart ")
            msg.setText(f"La suppretion de l'employé a échoué : {result}")
            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Critical)
            x = msg.exec_()
        
        
        
        

    




import resources_rc


if __name__ == "__main__":
    import sys
    app = QtWidgets.QApplication(sys.argv)
    MainWindow = QtWidgets.QMainWindow()
    ui = Ui_MainWindow()
    ui.setupUi(MainWindow)
    icon = QtGui.QIcon(":/resources/profile_pic.png")  
    MainWindow.setWindowIcon(icon)
    MainWindow.show()
    sys.exit(app.exec_())
